about:
Hello! 

 I am Casmiro Granado, and I've been in love with programming for 8 years now. In this time, I have worked on numerous projects and have had **three** internships. I love Software Development because I love the problems I get to solve. Also, importantly, I love the people I get to meet and collaborate with. I am a continuous learner who loves to take on new and exciting challenges! I know my dedication and drive for Software Development means I can tackle any problem.
